name: Zombie Survival Last Day 2
description:
Meet the new part of Zombie Survival simulator game series! In new game you must survive in apocalypse world! Stay alive as long as you can! You are surrounded by zombies and other terrible creatures.

The wasteland is full of dangerous creatures and abandoned buildings. If you wander long in abandoned places, then you will be able to find there weapons with ammunition. If you are lucky, then a first aid kit that will restore your health. To survive, you must search for weapons. You can meet such weapons as a pistol, a revolver, a shotgun, an ak-47 assault rifle or even a crossbow!

Beware of the walking dead zombies! They try infect you!
Start exploration of wasteland zombie world in new shooter game - Zombie Survival Last Day - 2!
